channel.title: [317] 2 Questions
channel.description: #1 Clicked: 6828 <-- how to get rid of that stuff? #2 I have a co-owner and me and him need to be able to do the same commands how would I add his name to it?

item.title: [317] 2 Questions
item.dc:creator: @Shadowspkin Shadowspkin
item.description:
@Shadowspkin wrote:

I know im not giving you the command it’s an example…

Like say it’s pickup and it’s for your name / Copy the command and put in his name there (what ever the command is
l
if(command.startsWith(“vent”) && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Shadow”)) {
try {
for(int i = 0; i < server.npcHandler.npcs.length; i++) {
try {
if(server.npcHandler.npcs[i] != null) {
server.npcHandler.npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
server.npcHandler.npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
server.npcHandler.npcs[i].textUpdate = command.substring(5);
}
} catch (Exception e) {
sM(“npcslot “+i+” invalid for shouting.”);
}
}
} catch (Exception e) {
sM(“command (”+command+") was invalid, please check your input.");
}

Read full topic

item.title: [317] 2 Questions
item.dc:creator: @Shadowspkin Shadowspkin
item.description:
@Shadowspkin wrote:

Your commands are probley set-up by name, So you need to look for the command like if it was pickup, Go to client.java CTRL+F write pickup search untell you see something like this

if(command.startsWith("vent") && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Shadow")) { try { for(int i = 0; i < server.npcHandler.npcs.length; i++) { try { if(server.npcHandler.npcs[i] != null) { server.npcHandler.npcs[i].updateRequired = true; server.npcHandler.npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; server.npcHandler.npcs[i].textUpdate = command.substring(5); } } catch (Exception e) { sM("npcslot "+i+" invalid for shouting."); } } } catch (Exception e) { sM("command ("+command+") was invalid, please check your input."); }

Read full topic
